formElement.documentation: Previously defined configuration for the plugin
formElement.label: Configuration Name:

formElement.documentation: Project key (short name) of project that contains build plan.
formElement.label: Project Key:

formElement.documentation: Short name of plan to get details. Might be simply planKey or composite planKey-jobKey.
formElement.label: Plan Key:

formElement.documentation: Count of old builds to retrieve from server on the first run. If omited it will be set to 10.
formElement.label: Initial Count:

formElement.documentation: Property sheet where run metadata will be stored. If omitted, /mySchedule/EC-Bamboo-%JobName%-build will be used for schedule context. For all other contexts root is /myProject.
formElement.label: Metadata Property Path:

formElement.documentation: Base URL for the Bamboo. If empty it will be set to %url_from_configuration%/job/%Job name%.
formElement.label: Base URL for drill-down:

formElement.documentation: If checked, no data will be sent to the reporting system. Use this option to preview gathered data.
formElement.label: Preview:

formElement.documentation: If checked, the log level will be set to "Debug".
formElement.label: Debug:
